content: this pattern is free on my blog or you can purchase the pdf here the well dressed dog coat is ready to perk up your pet with gorgeous colors - in 4 sizes it s got a bit of stretch so pick the size closest to the chest measurement of your dog going with the larger size if it s a draw the well dressed dog coat is pretty darn quick to crochet - meaning you can whip one up for every occasion lion brand new basic 175 comes in all main colors so you can go with oranges for halloween red and green for christmas - and don t forget your favorite sports team
